name: Gauntlet (itch) (SimonAshcroftGD)
description:
Gauntlet is a game I created for the 186th weeklygamejam. The game is about stopping the robots from completing your course by setting off traps and obstacles to knock them off.

The theme for the Game Jam was 'Alternate Perspectives'

All the assets and programming was created using Autodesk Maya and Unreal Engine 4.
